Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Componente dell’Editorial Board: Transational Journal of Mathematical Analisys
Componente dell’Editorial Board: International Journal of Mathematical Analisys

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: “WINTER SCHOOL” – L’UNIVERSITÀ PARIS 1 – LA SORBONNE -PROCESSI DI RESTRUTTURAZIONE DI IMPRESA. Relazione :” LA MATEMATICA NELLE SCIENZE ECONOMICHE E GIURIDICHE”.
6 International Economics Workshop on Social and Economic Condition of Regional Development, Stettino 2008. Relazione: "Optimal Management for a Economic transport problem".
Enterprise in the Face of 21 Century Challenges – Development, Management and Entrepreneurship, Cracovia 2008. Relazione: "Optimal Management for a Economic transport problem".

Comitato Organizzatore della VII International Conference on Stochastic Geometry, Convex Bodies, Empirical Measures & Applications to Engineering Train Transport, Messina (Italy). Relazione. "Risk analysis of hazardous materials transportation by railway".
Global and Regional Challenges for the 21 Century Economies – Cracovia 2009. Relazione: "On some topological aspects about cooperative solutions of non trasferable utility games".

VIII INTERNATIONAL SCIENTIFIC SYMPOSIUM - ECONOMY AND ENTERPRISES OF EUROPEAN COUNTRIES IN OVERCOMING THE CONSEQUENCES OF THE CRISIS, KIEV. Relazione:"Laplace type problem of the risk analysis about hazardous materials".

Recent Advances in Applied & Biomedical Informatics and Computational Engineering in System Applications, Firenze 23-25 agosto 2011. Relazioni: "On the measurability of the Families in the Euclidean Plane. • A Laplace type problem for a regular lattice with six obstacles".

Comitato Organizzatore della VIII International Conference on Stochastic Geometry, Convex Bodies, Empirical Measures & Applications to Engineering Train Transport, Taormina (Italy). Relazioni: "Laplace problems for regular lattices with eight obstacles", "Laplace type problems for three hexagonal lattices with "disk body test "".
Mathematical, Econometrical and Computer Methods in Finance and Insurance, Katowice 2011. Relazione: "On risk analysis for hazardous materials".

Mathematics Models & Methods in Applied Sciences, Iasi (Romania), 13-15 giugno 2012. Relazioni: "Adoptimg statistical Methods for assessing the adjustment of employees potential to needs identified by organization".
International Conference on Applied Mathematics and Computer Methods in Engineering II. Praga 2-4 Aprile 2014. Relazione: "A Mathematical approach for the Reference Contingent Problem".

Comitato Organizzatore della IX International Conference on Stochastic Geometry, Convex Bodies, Empirical Measures & Applications to Engineering Train Transport, Catania (Italy). Relazione: "The distribution function of a chord in a non-convex poligon".
39° Convegno AMASES, Padova 10-12 settembre 2015. Relazione: "More on competition and bargaining in Exchange Economy: a survey and new prospectives".
40° Convegno AMASES, Catania 15-17 settembre 2015. Relazione: Optimality Conditions for Nondifferentiable Multiobjective Semi-Infinite Programming Problems.

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Responsabile Gruppo di Ricerca per l'Università degli Studi di Messina e la Provincia di Reggio Calabria per la “Definizione del Piano Statistico Provinciale”, creazione "Osservatorio Demografico".
Responsabile ricerche gruppo di lavoro del progetto STIGAFF (Sistema Transazionale intercanale gestione avanzata flussi finanziari).

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Socio AMASES (ASSOCIAZIONE PER LA MATEMATICA APPLICATA ALLE SCIENZE ECONOMICHE E SOCIALI).
Socio WSEAS (World Scientific and Engineering Academy and Society).
Socio SIMAI (Società Italiana di Matematica Applicata e Industriale).
